text: @Mike_Pence @FLOTUS @realDonaldTrump I am a healthcare worker working with COVID19 pts every day and I am terrified!!! We know this virus spreads like wildfire! I’m incredibly terrified as states start opening. Me along with all healthcare workers will continue to put these pts ahead of our own safety. Stand with us
